IRenderer*

Renderer

width
uint32

width of texture in pixels

height

height of texture in pixels

format

image format

cpuFlags
D3D11_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG

D3D cpu flags to use

bindFlags
D3D11_BIND_FLAG

D3D bind flags to use

Returns

Returns the created texture

CreateTexture
CAUSTICAPI CRefObj<ITexture> CreateTexture(
IRenderer *pRenderer,
IImage *pImage,
D3D11_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG cpuFlags,
D3D11_BIND_FLAG bindFlags
)

Creates a texture from an <IImage at Caustic::IImage>.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

Renderer

pImage
IImage*

image to use

cpuFlags
D3D11_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG

Flags indicating allowed access to texture from CPU (see D3D11 documentation)

bindFlags
D3D11_BIND_FLAG

bind flags (see D3D11 documentation)

Returns

Returns the created texture

CTexture
CTexture::CTexture(
IRenderer *pRenderer,
uint32 width,
uint32 height,
DXGI_FORMAT format,
D3D11_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG cpuFlags,
D3D11_BIND_FLAG bindFlags
) : m_Format(format), m_Width(width), m_Height(height)

Ctor for our texture wrapper object

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

Graphics renderer

width
uint32

Width of image in pixels

height
uint32

Height of image in pixels

format
DXGI_FORMAT

Defines the pixel format for the image

cpuFlags
D3D11_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG

Flags indicating allowed access to texture from CPU (see D3D11 documentation)

bindFlags
D3D11_BIND_FLAG

bind flags (see D3D11 documentation)
